Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Kanefer with a green and yellow striped lappet wig, a brown face, a green and red collar, brown hands in relief holding low-relief representations of a red and yellow seed basket and a hoe, the body is painted white and the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in nine rows of incised black hieroglyphs separated by incised red lines.
